alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 12 at 12:56PM MST until February 15 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Johnson County and Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions will be possible with this event. The lower end snowfall amounts will occur over the southern half of Johnson County, but the blowing snow will still be a hazard over this area.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
